assessments.status_rationale: No official ONS release for November 2025 UK CPI yet; none of today's news references a CPI print.
The November 2025 U.S. PPI release is due in December; no coverage in today's news.
BoJ Tankan Q4 2025 is typically released mid-December; no result reported in today's articles.
China’s November FX reserves (SAFE) are expected in early December; no mention in the news items.
Year-end window remains open and no EIA weekly report cited shows the specified gasoline product supplied threshold.
Performance window runs through 2025-12-31; one day into the period is insufficient to judge, and no definitive performance spread reported.
No evidence today that WTI has settled at or above $82 during the window; outcome still possible before 2025-12-31.
November 2025 U.S. Housing Starts are due mid-December; not referenced in today's reporting.
November 2025 U.S. Core CPI will be released in December; no data in today’s headlines.
Euro area November Services PMI final is due around 2025-12-04; not covered in today’s news.
No UK Iran-related sanctions announcement noted; articles mention sanctions by South Korea, not the UK.
The relevant KEV window (2025-12-01 to 2025-12-15) has not begun; no CISA updates cited.
